short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay updated with live bitcoin price in USD every time you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BitTrack Live - Stay Updated with Real-Time Bitcoin Prices!
Keep track of the live Bitcoin price directly from your new tab with BitTrack Live! This powerful Chrome extension provides you with the latest Bitcoin currency data in real-time, ensuring you're always in the loop with the most up-to-date market information.

Key Features:

- Live Bitcoin Price: Get instant access to the current Bitcoin value, updated in real-time, right from your new tab.
- Clean and Simple Interface: A minimalist design that presents the essential information without any clutter.
- Enhanced Search Experience: Along with live Bitcoin data, your new tab search will be powered by Microsoft Bing, offering you reliable search results.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I agree to install the BitTrack Live Chrome extension and set my new tab search to be powered by Bing, as described in our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

About: https://lagoonads.com/about/
Contact: https://lagoonads.com/#contact
Terms of use: https://lagoonads.com/terms-and-conditions-bit-track/
